an3.26:3.5: BB has “in various respects” for tattha tattha, but this is too weak. It is an emphatic universal, as seen in https://suttacentral.net/pi/sn1.26 unlike the sun an moon, fire shines both day and night; https://suttacentral.net/pi/sn17.8 the mangu jackal is afflicted everywhere he goes; https://suttacentral.net/pi/thag2.32 dwellings are always impermanent; or https://suttacentral.net/pi/thag1.1, not having insight in various respects, but everywhere.
